scenes.description: Ceres Fauna presenting her 3D showcase commemorative merchandise: the 'Sap-Ring Smartphone Ring'.
Fauna's ending monologue, thanking the viewers and reflecting on her experience as a gaming idol.
Final farewells and waving goodbye as the scene fades to black.
A humorous outro featuring Fauna and a Sapling in a truck labeled 'Bethany' with 'Mother Trucker' on the side.
